result.title: Final Dissemination and Communication Report
result.description: This deliverable aims to provide the final report on all dissemination communication standardisation and stakeholder engagement activities performed during the last reporting period of the project the report of the DataVaults hackathon will also be included In addition this deliverable will provide a detailed report about which data have been collected and generated during the project and describe how it will be shared and opened after the projects completion The report will also document the communication and clustering activities undertaken
